channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Conclave Primer
item.description: We look at how the Catholic Church will select Pope Francis’ successor.

item.title: A group of anonymous traders scored a $100 million payday by buying Melania Trump’s memecoin just before it launched publicly
item.description: $MELANIA is down 98% from its peak of $133.73 on the day after its public launch.

item.title: Jefferson Griffin in N.C. Supreme Court Race Concedes Defeat
item.description: Three counts had showed that the incumbent, a Democrat, won the election last fall. But for months, Judge Jefferson Griffin tried to reverse his loss ...

item.title: Deepfakes gave AI a bad rap but the tech has real uses—it just needs guardrails, experts say
item.description: AI leaders have a “duty” to make sure the technology is used in a responsible way, said Daniel Hulme, CEO of Satalia.

item.title: Biden Criticizes Trump in BBC Interview
item.description: In his first broadcast interview since leaving office, the former president criticized several of President Trump’s actions and defended his withdrawa...

item.title: Disney is building a new theme park and resort in Abu Dhabi
item.description: UAE park will be the seventh Disney theme park resort worldwide.

item.title: The Symbolism Behind India’s ‘Operation Sindoor’
item.description: The name for the military attack on Pakistan brings to mind a woman who became shorthand for the grief wrought by a terrorist attack.

item.title: How the Trump family is poised to profit from a $2 billion Middle East crypto deal that uses their stablecoin
item.description: The transaction has prompted Democrats to reverse course on bipartisan stablecoin legislation.

item.title: Amazon is rolling out a robot with a sense of touch—but it won’t replace humans, the company says
item.description: Amazon Robotics' chief technologist, Tye Brady, wants to "eliminate" every mundane task faced by humans.

item.title: Salt Lake City and Boise Adopt Official Pride Flags in Response to State Laws
item.description: The cities approved several new flags after Utah and Idaho passed laws barring unofficial flags from being displayed on government property.

item.title: Live Updates: Cardinals Gather in Sistine Chapel to Elect Pope
item.description: The conclave to select the next leader of 1.4 billion Roman Catholics, a secretive vote wreathed in history and ritual, comes at an uncertain moment f...

item.title: Cardinals Begin Conclave With an Oath
item.description: The cardinals at the Sistine Chapel in Vatican City vow to follow the rules of the conclave, the process by which the next pope is chosen.

item.title: Libya’s Rival Governments Both Deny Deal to Take Deported U.S. Migrants
item.description: U.S. officials have said the Trump administration plans to send immigrants to the divided country on military flights as soon as this week.

item.title: The Symbolism Behind India’s ‘Operation Sindoor’
item.description: The name for the military attack on Pakistan brings to mind a woman who became shorthand for the grief wrought by a terrorist attack.

item.title: A top cardinal asks for divine guidance at a ‘difficult’ moment in history.
